data.name: Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All - Skull Noir Bundle
data.detailed_description:
The Skull Noir Bundle for Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All adds a custom skull-themed paint job, new rims, body kits, the Chrome Black to Grey paint bundle, and the Racing Carburetors parachute. Just make sure not to burn yourself on the flaming skulls!

*Must own Blue Air vehicle to apply new body kits.
data.about_the_game:
The Skull Noir Bundle for Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All adds a custom skull-themed paint job, new rims, body kits, the Chrome Black to Grey paint bundle, and the Racing Carburetors parachute. Just make sure not to burn yourself on the flaming skulls!

*Must own Blue Air vehicle to apply new body kits.
data.short_description: The Skull Noir Bundle for Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All adds a custom skull-themed paint job, new rims, body kits, the Chrome Black to Grey paint bundle, and the Racing Carburetors parachute. Just make sure not to burn yourself on the flaming skulls!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 @ 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 2700 X @ 3.7GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
